text: Cidade Jardim is a train station on CPTM Line 9-Emerald, located in the district of Pinheiros in São Paulo. It is next to São Paulo Jockey Club and Pinheiros Sport Club. ==History== The station was built by CPTM, during the "South Line Dinamization" and opened on 30 June 2000, being projected by architect Luiz Carlos Esteves in 1994. ==References== Category:CPTM stations Category:Railway stations opened in 2000 Category:2000 establishments in Brazil
title: Cidade Jardim (CPTM)
